Write a chapter in thesis style that thoroughly analyzes a topic within your field of study. Be sure to include a clear and concise thesis statement, a detailed literature review, a well-supported methodology, and a comprehensive analysis of your findings with in-text citations of primary source and secondary sources with references in MLA format. Draw conclusions based on your research and discuss their implications for the field. Remember to use proper academic language, and provide appropriate citations and references. My first task is to select a topic that is relevant and interesting to my field. The target language is [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Write 6000 words for each topic
